phrs.translation: 沥青路, 动词第三人称单数

sentences.sentence: Hoops is hot in China—just witness the Nike-clad kids on the Beijing blacktops, showing off their crossover dribble.
sentences.translation: 只需看看那些在北京室外球场上穿着耐克、炫耀着交叉步运球的孩子们，就会发现篮球在中国如此火热。

sentences.sentence: Hoops is hot in China ― just witness the Nike-clad kids on the Beijing blacktops, showing off their crossover dribble ― largely because of him.
sentences.translation: 只需看看那些在北京室外球场上穿着耐克、玩着交叉步运球的孩子们， （就会发现）篮球在中国如此火热，而这些几乎都可以归功于姚明。
